Folks the key to getting this to work is a comment by "kupakups at 2011-10-29 05:30 CET:
put both bugfix.reg and keygen at the install directory and execute it from there. use the serial with the authentication code generated."

 I rewrote the install notes to reflect this bit of info: 

Sony Sound Forge Pro 10.0c Build 491
====================================

1- Install Sound Forge,but don't run yet.

2- Copy both the bugfix.reg file and the keygen and put them in

the install directory ( C:\Program files(x86)\Sony\Sound Forge Pro 10.0\).

DO NOT close this window!

3-  Run the Keygen and select Sound Forge 10 series, then click on patch. After

patch is successful right click on the bugfix.reg file and let it run 

(say yeswhen asked).

4- Now run Sound Forge program, enter serial(from keygen), choose register from another computer, 

 click next, next, save the license anywhere, (you can delete it), enter the activation code.
continued- I used this method and it works. This method also works with Sony Vegas Pro 11. I am running windows 7 64 bit. No Problems encountered.

Reading all the comments above and problems some people had (including myself), I re-write once again the instructions to be sure we don't miss any step. It is perfectly working now. Thanks everyone.

====================================
Sony Sound Forge Pro 10.0c Build 491
====================================

1- Install Sound Forge, but don't run yet.

2- Copy both the bugfix.reg file and the keygen and put them in the install directory ( C:Program files(x86)SonySound Forge Pro 10.0). (If you don't the activation code shows an error on the last step).

DO NOT close this window!

3- Right click on the Keygen file and "Run as Administrator" (Win7: this is very important otherwise it will show an error when trying to patch). Select Sound Forge 10 series, then click on patch and be sure you select the installation folder. After patch is successful right click on the bugfix.reg file and let it run (say yes when asked).

4- Now run Sound Forge program, enter serial (from keygen), choose register from another computer, click next, next, save the license anywhere, (you can delete it), enter the activation code.

====================================
